ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:25:48 [Issue ID 4000-356124] urn:comicvine:4000-356124 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 13:02:34. [Issue ID 998049]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Imprisoned by the authorities, Sela finds herself lost in a sea of some of the worst criminals in the world. Struggling with the consequences of her actions, Sela begins to try and help the select few inmates who deserve a second chance- never realizing that deep within the prison itself a powerful being watches from the shadows.
Notes:
The Regular cover is a homage to the famous interior scene of The Amazing Spider-Man #50.
